docs.snippet: A federal appeals court in Manhattan ordered a rare second round of arguments on Wednesday as former SAC Capital Advisors portfolio manager Mathew Martoma tries to overturn his insider trading conviction....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court in Manhattan ordered a rare second round of arguments on Wednesday as former SAC Capital Advisors portfolio manager Mathew Martoma tries to overturn his insider trading conviction.

headline.main: Rare Re-Argument Ordered in Insider Trading Appeal of SAC's Martoma

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Theresa May will seek to use her majority in parliament's lower chamber to overturn a defeat her government suffered in the upper chamber on legislation allowing her to trigger Brexit, a government source said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Theresa May will seek to use her majority in parliament's lower chamber to overturn a defeat her government suffered in the upper chamber on legislation allowing her to trigger Brexit, a government source said on Wednesday.

headline.main: UK Government to Try to Overturn Parliamentary Defeat on Brexit Legislation: Source

docs.snippet: Syria's government negotiators at peace talks in Geneva have held deep and constructive talks with U.N. mediator Staffan de Mistura over the past two days and agreed to discuss subjects including terrorism and political issues, a source close to t...
docs.lead_paragraph: Syria's government negotiators at peace talks in Geneva have held deep and constructive talks with U.N. mediator Staffan de Mistura over the past two days and agreed to discuss subjects including terrorism and political issues, a source close to the delegation said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Syrian Government Puts 'Terrorism' on Geneva Agenda: Source
headline.print_headline: Syrian Government Puts 'Terrorism' on Geneva Agenda: Source

docs.snippet: The White House told a government watchdog agency that Kellyanne Conway, a senior aide to President Donald Trump, acted "inadvertently" when she publicly endorsed the clothing and jewelry line of Trump's daughter, Ivanka, according to a letter the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House told a government watchdog agency that Kellyanne Conway, a senior aide to President Donald Trump, acted "inadvertently" when she publicly endorsed the clothing and jewelry line of Trump's daughter, Ivanka, according to a letter the administration released on Wednesday.

headline.main: Kellyanne Conway 'Inadvertently' Plugged Ivanka Products: White House
headline.print_headline: Kellyanne Conway 'Inadvertently' Plugged Ivanka Products: White House

docs.snippet: The Virginia school board that wants to keep a transgender teen from using the boys' restroom at his high school is calling on the Supreme Court to delay consideration of the case to allow the Trump administration to weigh in....
